protocol.name: P-TABM-4738
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated using the Qiagen Plant RNeasy MiniKit (Quiagen, Hilden, Germany) according to the manufacturer's instruction. The quality of the isolated RNA was determined with a NanoDrop ND 1000 (NanoDrop Technologies, Delaware, USA) and a Bioanalyzer 2100 (Agilent, Waldbronn, Germany). Only samples with a 260 nm/280 nm ratio between 1.8–2.1 and a 28S/18S ratio within 1.5–2 were processed further.

protocol.name: P-TABM-4739
protocol.text: Plants were grown in growth chambers at 70% humidity and daily cycles of 16 h light and 8 h darkness at the specified temperature.

protocol.name: P-TABM-4740
protocol.text: One-Cycle cDNA Synthesis Kit (Affymetrix, P/N 900431, Santa Clara, CA)

protocol.name: P-TABM-5194
protocol.text: Seeds of at least 20 siliques per sample was pooled per replicate
